title: Low Elo is Hilarious af xD
body: Ever have that moment when you are playing a normal game and someone in that game says that the champ you are playing is "Unfair" "Broken" "No counter pick" Ect.? Ikr same. Here is a tip for you low elo players ( High Silver - below ) EVERY champion has counter play, maybe if you weren't sitting on your ass all day complaining  about why a champ is OP and shit, why don't you try and do some research about how to play against them. Blaming the champion isn't going to help you improve and you dam well know it, you just use it as an excuse for why you lost X game. Why don't you try to see that you have done something wrong, you know that X champion has that for his ability, and work around it. For instants, Since i am a Riven 1 trick, Yea sue me, i know my matchups pretty well, even the once that counter me, so i find myself barely blaming the champs when i lose, usually it's either i played badly or they played well, simple, champs has nothing to do with weather someone wins or loses lane if you know what your doing. Played against a Malphite and i get lv 6 before he did and killed him at half HP, he then writes "Wow broken fan champ deals 700 damage in one blow, you know Riot fucked up" this line really cracked me up because they guy was building FUCKING AP XDDD. Like bruh? Another game i played against an Arelioen sol and got fb at lv 4, (all this games were in norms btw) him and his lil bronze duo then went on and said "wow playing the easiest champion in the game, you shouldn't feel proud" xDD, None of this games have i been toxic btw, never said a bad word back, i replied with "If you can find a person that is of Plat and above that agrees with your statement, i will gift you a skin" he then replied with "Yea, just ask everyone in the LOL community" xD. Didn't realise that everyone in the LOL community was Plat, dam i must be missing out, cause i'm only in Gold. You get my point, if you think a champ is OP or Broken in any sense, then why don't you do all of us a favour, and show us that they really are broken by playing them for the next 3 games, and going positive in all of them. Yea sure, i'm gonna get hate for this, but you know that i'm not wrong. Many examples can be taken from this, someone once said TF was broken, someone else said Malphite was broken, if a champion is truely broken, don't you think the community or even Riot would do something about it? If Riven is Truely "OP" and "Broken" then don't you think that'll come to Riot's attention?  Just admit it, you lost to that one lv 7 Jax top lane, not because he was broken, but because he played better than you did :) Also made a post, Out of this 3 champs, who is the most "Unskilled" of them all, have fun :D
